options.description: Specify a json option file that should be loaded. If not specified TypeDoc will look for 'typedoc.json' in the current directory.

tsconfig.description: Specify a TypeScript config file that should be loaded. If not specified TypeDoc will look for 'tsconfig.json' in the current directory.

compilerOptions.description: Selectively override the TypeScript compiler options used by TypeDoc.

entryPoints.description: The entry points of your documentation.

entryPointStrategy.description: The strategy to be used to convert entry points into documentation modules.

exclude.description: Define patterns to be excluded when expanding a directory that was specified as an entry point.

externalPattern.description: Define patterns for files that should be considered being external.

excludeExternals.description: Prevent externally resolved symbols from being documented.

excludeNotDocumented.description: Prevent symbols that are not explicitly documented from appearing in the results.

excludeInternal.description: Prevent symbols that are marked with @internal from being documented.

media.description: Specify the location with media files that should be copied to the output directory.

includes.description: Specify the location to look for included documents (use [[include:FILENAME]] in comments).

out.description: Specify the location the documentation should be written to.

json.description: Specify the location and filename a JSON file describing the project is written to.

pretty.description: Specify whether the output JSON should be formatted with tabs.

emit.description: Specify what TypeDoc should emit, 'docs', 'both', or 'none'.

theme.description: Specify the theme name to render the documentation with

lightHighlightTheme.description: Specify the code highlighting theme in light mode.

darkHighlightTheme.description: Specify the code highlighting theme in dark mode.

customCss.description: Path to a custom CSS file to for the theme to import.

markedOptions.description: Specify the options passed to Marked, the Markdown parser used by TypeDoc.

name.description: Set the name of the project that will be used in the header of the template.

includeVersion.description: Add the package version to the project name.

disableSources.description: Disable setting the source of a reflection when documenting it.

basePath.description: Specifies the base path to be used when displaying file paths.

excludeTags.description: Remove the listed block/modifier tags from doc comments.

readme.description: Path to the readme file that should be displayed on the index page. Pass `none` to disable the index page and start the documentation on the globals page.

cname.description: Set the CNAME file text, it's useful for custom domains on GitHub Pages.

gitRevision.description: Use specified revision instead of the last revision for linking to GitHub/Bitbucket source files.

gitRemote.description: Use the specified remote for linking to GitHub/Bitbucket source files.

githubPages.description: Generate a .nojekyll file to prevent 404 errors in GitHub Pages. Defaults to `true`.

htmlLang.description: Sets the lang attribute in the generated html tag.

gaID.description: Set the Google Analytics tracking ID and activate tracking code.

hideGenerator.description: Do not print the TypeDoc link at the end of the page.

searchInComments.description: If set, the search index will also include comments. This will greatly increase the size of the search index.

cleanOutputDir.description: If set, TypeDoc will remove the output directory before writing output.

commentStyle.description: Determines how TypeDoc searches for comments.

blockTags.description: Block tags which TypeDoc should recognize when parsing comments.

inlineTags.description: Inline tags which TypeDoc should recognize when parsing comments.

modifierTags.description: Modifier tags which TypeDoc should recognize when parsing comments.

categorizeByGroup.description: Specify whether categorization will be done at the group level.

defaultCategory.description: Specify the default category for reflections without a category.

categoryOrder.description: Specify the order in which categories appear. * indicates the relative order for categories not in the list.

sort.description: Specify the sort strategy for documented values.

visibilityFilters.description: Specify the default visibility for builtin filters and additional filters according to modifier tags.

searchCategoryBoosts.description: Configure search to give a relevance boost to selected categories

searchGroupBoosts.description: Configure search to give a relevance boost to selected kinds (eg "class")

watch.description: Watch files for changes and rebuild docs on change.

preserveWatchOutput.description: If set, TypeDoc will not clear the screen between compilation runs.

showConfig.description: Print the resolved configuration and exit.

plugin.description: Specify the npm plugins that should be loaded. Omit to load all installed plugins, set to 'none' to load no plugins.

logger.description: Specify the logger that should be used, 'none' or 'console'.

logLevel.description: Specify what level of logging should be used.

treatWarningsAsErrors.description: If set, warnings will be treated as errors.

intentionallyNotExported.description: A list of types which should not produce 'referenced but not documented' warnings.

requiredToBeDocumented.description: A list of reflection kinds that must be documented

validation.description: Specify which validation steps TypeDoc should perform on your generated documentation.
